name: MoleMole
description:
MoleMole is a game where two players compete against each other in an arena that destroys itself after 35 seconds and drops players to a deeper level.

The player who frags more times through three 35-second arenas wins.

Both players have a melee attack at their disposal, as well as a pistol and shotgun, which they can collect on the level.

This game started as Ludum Dare 48 submission, unfortunately, we weren't able to finish it under given time, however we decided to continue our work!

You can check both LD48 and current versions.

Enjoy!
